metadata.name: Be like a toadüê∏
metadata.description:
There is so little constancy in our ever-changing reality. Right now we are flying through space at breakneck speed on a spinning ball, straight into the cosmic unknown. 
Many try to hold on to something, to create a beacon or a stumbling block, but our lives are constantly changing, for they consist entirely of moments, between the past and the future.
All we have is a path. 
We may try for a long time to enjoy the momentary seconds of joy, to immerse ourselves in the mundane, but it's only moments. They are insignificant before the amazing beauty and infinite versatility of our world and the other worlds floating beside us in the cosmic void. 
Close your eyes, take a deep breath, and try to enjoy this magnificent moment of universal and undivided unity, for this is our life.
"We can only enjoy the moment 
 After all, this is our life
 So lets live like a toad"
